com.example.cartrackr.util

Class FirebaseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cartrackr.util.FirebaseUtil

  • public class FirebaseUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for initializing Firebase services and connecting them to the Firebase Emulator Suite if necessary.

    April 2021
    Author:
